Name: VR Parallel World
About the game: Are you living your best life? Have you ever thought about a next life? Join this game, where you can recreate your life in another world, with your beloved girl, in any space-time of your choice. You may wait till kingdom come ... or try this game. This is not a VR Minecraft, although you can create too, but everything and every person in this game were so real and even beautiful. You will create a new life/world for yourself, in any space-time you love. This is not a VR Porn, although you can DIY bodies too, sexy ladies, lovely girls, you can even become one of them, but the faces you generate were so real and they can interact with you. This is not a VR Travelling, although you can fly & tour hundreds of worlds, but the magic power you own, makes you different. You will master aging or youth, cold winter or golden autumn, beauty or wither, ice-bound or melting. So we call this game another world. Hereafter. In the game, players can click on any world card to start a new world. For example, you can choose to live in Jurassic Age，Pre-History，Early History，Medieval Age，Victorian，19th Century，1920s，1940s，1980s，Modern，or even Future World. Players can then place various characters or infrastructures in their selected scenes. They can control the size and direction when placing the additional objects or completely recreate them. They can also choose to upload their creations for other players to download and use. Subsystems/functions include: (1) Choose a body for yourself. Or you can play without a VR body too. You will see yourself. And you can open a mirror from the main panel. (2) Fly freely & Fly over thousands of worlds. (3) Build this world. Construction mode：Experience a building system exclusively optimized for roomscale VR in a way that was never seen before. You can even move blocks after you have placed them. (4）Magic. You will master aging or youth, cold winter or golden autumn, beauty or wither, ice-bound or melting. (5) Hundreds of characters: You can decorate your world with 800+ different live characters. (6) Players can tailor-make their avatar’s body features and upload a photo from their computer to generate a face of their choice: This game is unique among all simulation games as it allows players to create faces through photos with one click. The AI technology used in this game ensures the complete copy of the photo uploaded by players. Note: The uploaded photo will be immediately reflected on players’ avatar, as shown in the above/below examples. All the head designs customized by the player will be stored in a VR 3D menu. Players can drag any head from this menu to their girl avatar for easy access. (7) DIY your virtual friends/lovers: Body shape, Clothes, Design Actions/Animations Players can set their avatar’s body features at will. The 3D menu offers diverse options for bust, waist, and hip measurements. They can also choose their avatar’s skin tone, leg to butt ratio, and hairstyle as finishing touches. Players can choose their avatar’s movements. The game offers a library of more than 200 daily actions and 60 sets of dance actions for players to set combinations. Players can pick the clothes for their avatar. Players can unleash their creativity through the comprehensive and powerful control panel below. (8）Control Your Body Size. Want to explore panties as a fly? Players can choose to be a mini butterfly, or maybe a giant. (9) Raise your VR pet in this new world. You can also ride on them. You can even create a zoo, as well as prehistoric creatures, including various dinosaurs. (10)More than 100+ tools. Here, you can create your dreams. See you in the new world!
